trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_SEQ_00<tab>Yagoro needs hard-to-find supplies from hard-to-reach places.
TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_TODO_00<tab>Obtain a crystal from the orange pond.
TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_TODO_01<tab>Obtain water from the green pond.
TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the crystal and water to Yagoro.
TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_YAGORO_000_000<tab>You are <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, unless I'm mistaken? I have need of your help. Please hear me out.

TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_YAGORO_000_001<tab>You would never guess, but I'm in fact a craftsman by trade. With the Front being constantly shorthanded, however, I've become more of a jack-of-all-trades. Most recently, I've been tasked with procuring certain rare supplies, but it's quite beyond one of my humble abilities. Allow me to explain.

TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_YAGORO_000_002<tab>To the north of here, there lies a peculiar place called Prism Lake. There you'll find exposed deposits of high-purity crystals which, through some trick of the elements, have changed the waters into the colors of the rainbow.
TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_YAGORO_000_003<tab>Well, whatever is responsible for this phenomenon seems to have also made the local Namazu uncommonly savage, making it quite impossible for me to do my job.

TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_YAGORO_000_004<tab>However, I believe one of your prowess would have little difficulty. I would be most grateful were you to procure a crystal from the orange pond and some water from the green pond. Rest assured you will be compensated for your troubles.
TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_YAGORO_000_010<tab>Were you able to acquire what I asked for?
TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_YAGORO_000_011<tab>Wonderful! I knew I was right to entrust the task to you.
TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_YAGORO_000_012<tab>But tell me, what did you think of the scenery? The place is quite surreal, is it not?

TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_YAGORO_000_013<tab>Legend has it an angel once fell in love with a young nobleman of Doma. Wishing that he joined her in her heavenly domain, she fashioned for him a bridge out of a rainbow.

TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_YAGORO_000_014<tab>Alas, the gods were furious that she would bring a lowly mortal to their abode without their permission. And so they destroyed the bridge, reducing it to a thousand thousand pieces, before the nobleman could finish crossing.
TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_YAGORO_000_015<tab>The pieces of this bridge fell to the earth and into a lake, where it imbued the waters with their color. So it was that Prism Lake came to be.
TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_YAGORO_000_016<tab>Faerie tales aside, prism crystals are prized as an energy source, while prism water boasts potent healing properties. Both will serve us well in our fight.

TEXT_STMBDZ702_02805_YAGORO_000_017<tab>Right now, we enjoy the lake for its practical gifts, but one day I hope to simply enjoy it for its beauty. My thanks for your help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
